member.name: M:FlexApps.Attack_SmallSubgroup_DHE.Attack_SmallSubgroup_DHE.client(System.Boolean,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.String,Microsoft.FSharp.Core.FSharpOption{System.Int32})
member.summary: Runs a DHE handshake with an invalid ephemeral public key from a (small) subgroup
member.remarks: Learns y mod q where y is the server secret DH exponent (only useful if the server reuses y)
member.param: Check that server p is as expected and warn if gy changes
Number of retries before giving up
Small subgroup order (normally, a factor of p-1)
